resources.string: Start here\nAs a BITion\nChase your life
All sessions of your network account will be logged out
Force logout when exceeding session limit

Thanks for using, here is some help.

 * The four buttons in the round panel are: Settings, log out, log in, add SSID. Only WLANs in the list can be logged in automatically.
 * The ball in the middle presents the balance, currently showing after logged in by this app. When "unknown" balance is shown, you can still use the network.
 * During setup, all sessions of your network account will be logged off. Wait a moment for relogin.
 * If "login successful" is prompted repeatedly but you cannot access the web, please mamually log out and reconnect.
 * In future releases error reporting will be enabled. It only fires when you have WLAN connected. Your account information won't be uploaded (see the open source code).
 * This app is for the sake of BIT students and staffs. We will NEVER add any commercial ADs.

 By LangleyChang and entalent
SSID exists or list is full
Are you sure to sign out?
Not logged in yet, attempting to login
Connect failure, please check the network

Maximun login session number exceeded, if you believe your account has been stolen, contact Network Service Center
Login by web port disabled, use the official app to login instead

Your transfer flux has run out
Your online time has run out

Your profile is updating, please wait a moment and try again
Login successful

resources.string: Maximum login session number exceeded, if you believe your account has been stolen, contact Network Service Center
Tap to log out all online session and reconnect in %1$ds
